"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54840e30636872045faa0000#post_54840e30636872045faa0000
Some anarchist groups held protests in helsinki yesterday because independence day.
Basically a bunch of drunk teenagers walking around the city breaking windows with guy fawkes masks on, throwing things at the cops while calling for a class war. A proper comedy show, that.

[spoiler]I was hoping they'd clash with some far-right group so there'd be some good action, but no.[/spoiler]
